children.subject: Here is a link to the job description.
The doc isn't opening. Could you please post a link.
Hi thanks so much for this. Do you mind if I email you or something to talk about your experience of working at this company?

history.content:
Hi all! I wanted to share an exciting data science summer internship opportunity I came across. The people at this company are amazing and I'm sure you'll have an outstanding experience as an intern with them.

"East Bay Community Energy is offering a 10 week "remote internship" focusing on (1) Geo-Spatial Data Analytics, and (2) Data Mining for undergrads or MS level students. The internship will be with the Technology and Analytics team at EBCE. Outcomes from this internship will have the potential to have immediate and tangible impact on energy, climate and energy equity policy and programs in the East Bay. Please see the attached word document for more information about the position. The deadline for applying is June 15th.

East Bay Community Energy (EBCE) is the Community Choice energy service provider for approximately 550,000 customer accounts across Alameda County. EBCE’s charter is to provide its customers with low carbon, cost-effective electricity that integrates innovative energy products and maximizes local benefits through the development of local solutions, ranging from increasing access to rooftop solar to supporting the adoption of electric vehicles. We want creative problem solvers that are excited to work in an entrepreneurial environment and grow our organization! EBCE is committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce that is reflective of Alameda County’s rich culture and communities."

Technology_and_Analytics_Intern_2020.docx
